ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Easy?  How tough are the mobs that charm ? I m only level 18 right now..   so I ve got a ways to go...  wearing Goss. but *always* on the lookout for stuph
ygData.messageBody:
Easy? How tough are the mobs that "charm" ?

I'm only level 18 right now.. so I've got a ways to go... wearing Goss. but *always* on the lookout for "stuph" ;)

Dreven

> ----------
> From: Aura Dracul[SMTP:auradracul@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:34 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes
>
> From: "Aura Dracul" <auradracul@...>
>
> no a strong group for 24's with a wizard and a cleric can do it easy
>
> ~ Auraelle Dracul ~
> ~Priestess of Veeshan~
> ~ Follower of Tunare ~
> ~ Lords of Light ~
>

> >
> > Dreven

> > > ----------

> > > Ya know, I agree with um...mstokes I believe (too lazy to scroll back
> > > there) and I mentioned this before in my earlier post.. how about buying
> > > yourself a goss robe? Its A/C is 8 and isn't a bad robe ... its white
> and
> > > looks good..albeit still a bathrobe look...you should be able to pick
> one
> > > up for some plat or go to befallen and head to third level and acquire
> one
> > > yourself.. :) its much more satisfying to be able to get one
> > > yourself...really. OR invis and run through nek forest to lavastorm and
> go
> > > into the dungeon Najena and wait with the other throngs to try to get a
> > > flowing black robe off Najena. Might be a fun challenge for you...it'll
> > > just take some time is all....
